item.title: Nicki Minaj said something at Amfest that was really profound. I'm paraphrasing,...
item.description:
Nicki Minaj said something at Amfest that was really profound. I'm paraphrasing, but she said, "just because I want little black girls to think they're beautiful doesn't mean I need to put down little girls with blonde hair and blue eyes."
We all got wrapped up over the last few years in zero sum thinking. This was because the people who think they rule the world pit us against one another.@NICKIMINAJrejects that. We all should.

item.title:
Nicki Minaj is right.
We need to stand up for Christians that are being persecu...
item.description:
Nicki Minaj is right.
We need to stand up for Christians that are being persecuted.
Christians are the most persecuted religious group in the world.
385 million Christians worldwide face severe persecution for their faith.
You never hear about this in the media.

item.title: "We want to make Starfleet Academy real. Let's go out there and visit other star...
item.description:
"We want to make Starfleet Academy real. Let's go out there and visit other star systems and see if there are alien civilizations.
The universe is 13.8 billion years old and earth is about 4 1/2 billion years old. We are a mere 5500 year old civilization."
一 Elon Musk
